FuncDef: This command configures the preference level of either IS-IS Level 1 or IS-IS Level 2 internal routes. By default, the preferences are listed in the table below.

ParaDef.Info: The preference for external routes at this level expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Default preferences are listed in Table 46
				Table 46: 
			Default Preferences Route TypePreferenceConfigurable
Direct attached0No 
Static route5Yes 
MPLS7-
OSPF internal routes10No 
IS-IS level 1 internal15Yes
IS-IS level 2 internal18Yes
OSPF external150Yes 
IS-IS level 1 external160Yes 1
IS-IS level 2 external165Yes 1
BGP170Yes 
Note:External preferences are changed using the external-preference command in the config>router>isis>level level-number context.
